pageContext.claim: “Nick Sandmann and the students of Covington have become symbols of Fake News and how evil it can be. They have captivated the attention of the world, and I know they will use it for the good - maybe even to bring people together. It started off unpleasant, but can end in a dream!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is referring to a confrontation on the National Mall between Kentucky high school students wearing "Make America Great Again" hats and a Native American veteran. Video of the nonviolent confrontation went viral. The veteran at first said he felt threatened, but later accounts described the students as less threatening. News media reported based on the veteran's account and later updated their reports or ran new stories when the account changed. There was no media conspiracy.
